author: Statesman News Service
title: Congress opts out of UP Assembly bypolls leaving SP to contest all nine seats
text:
It is almost now official that the Congress will not contest the Uttar Pradesh assembly polls, instead, it will support the Samajwadi Party candidates in all the nine seats at stake.
Samajwadi Party President Akhilesh Yadav announced this at 11.11 pm on Wednesday night. He informed on X that INDIA bloc candidates would contest elections on SP’s election symbol ‘cycle’.
With this announcement, made by Akhilesh after talking to Rahul Gandhi on the phone, the suspense over the alliance and seat sharing between SP and Congress drew to a close. However, Congress state president Ajay Rai and other senior leaders remained tightlipped on the matter.
In fact, Congress was not interested in the seat offered to it by Akhilesh as the party found it difficult to clinch a victory. Later, the grand old party demanded the Phulpur seat of Prayagraj. However, on this seat, too unanimity could not be reached till the last moment.
On the other hand, Haji Mohammad Rizwan has been fielded by the SP from the Kundarki assembly constituency. So far, the party has announced seven candidates and is set to announce candidates for the remaining two seats, Ghaziabad and Khair, which were initially offered to Congress.
Last night, Akhilesh Yadav wrote on X, “It is not a matter of seat but of victory under this strategy, the joint candidates of ‘India Alliance’ will contest elections on all the nine seats on the symbol of Samajwadi Party’s ‘Cycle’.”
“Congress and Samajwadi Party are standing together, shoulder to shoulder, for a big victory. India Alliance is going to write a new chapter of victory in this by-election,” he added.
With the coming together of Congress’ top leadership along with booth-level workers, the strength of the Samajwadi Party has increased manifold. With this unprecedented cooperation and support, every worker of the ‘India Alliance’ has been filled with new energy with a pledge to strive for victory on all the nine assembly seats.
“This unity and solidarity of the ‘India Coalition’ in the interest of the country will write new history today and tomorrow also,” he added.
After Akhilesh’s late-night announcement of contesting the by-elections on all the seats, BJP Spokesperson Rakesh Tripathi took a jibe at the SP saying, “Indi alliance has disintegrated. In UP, the claws of the hand were once again left empty. Congress kept wringing its hands. SP has defeated Congress.
“SP is realising BJP’s ‘Congress-free’ slogan. Congress itself is responsible for its own plight. Akhilesh has taken revenge for Madhya Pradesh and Haryana assembly elections.”
Shortly after the remark of the BJP leader, Akhilesh shared his photo on X holding Rahul Gandhi’s hand.
Sources said, that during his telephonic conversation with Akhilesh Yadav on Wednesday night, Rahul Gandhi promised not to contest the by-elections and to give full support to SP. Akhilesh thanked Rahul for his cooperation.
Earlier, UP Congress President Ajay Rai was called by the Congress leadership to Delhi on Wednesday morning. He said, “I am not aware of it. We were supposed to have a meeting in Delhi, but due to Priyanka Gandhi’s nomination on Wednesday, all the senior leaders were in Wayanad. Returned late night, will hold a meeting on Thursday, after which Congress will clarify its position.”
In fact, the top leadership of Congress was not interested in the by-election. Congress’s focus was on Maharashtra and Jharkhand elections.
Sources said there was a long conversation between Rahul and Akhilesh before Rahul decided not to contest the by-election. Only after this did Akhilesh make a public announcement.

author: Get News
title: Wuxi Fuda Vulcanizer Manufacturing Co., Ltd Reveals Conveyor Joint and Repair Vulcanizing Machines With Advanced Technology for Unmatched Efficiency & Dependability | FinancialContent Business Page
text:
Wuxi Fuda Vulcanizer Manufacturing Co., Ltd introduces superior conveyor joints and repair vulcanizing machines known for their high efficiency, low energy consumption and user-friendly features. The type of conveyor joints and repair vulcanizing machine released by Wuxi Fuda Vulcanizer Manufacturing Co., Ltd. are used in various industries, including coal mine, metal mine, metallurgy, power plants, chemical plants, building material factories, port and wharf. These machines come with special features such as high efficiency, low energy consumption, and easy operation. This ensures that the machines can provide a smooth and efficient production process for customers. The technology used in these machines is constantly being upgraded to meet the changing needs of the market and provide customers with the best possible solutions. Customers can also request customizations to meet their specific requirements, making these machines highly versatile and adaptable. The engineers at this firm are highly knowledgeable and experienced, ensuring that the machines are of the highest quality and perform flawlessly. To check out the entire range of products offered, customers can visit their official website. The website also includes detailed product specifications and information about their applications.
The conveyor belt jointing machine is one of their specialized products, designed with advanced technology and precision engineering to provide a strong, reliable and durable joint for conveyor belts. These machines come with special features such as precise temperature and pressure control, automatic timing and alarm systems, and a user-friendly interface. Users can easily adjust and monitor the temperature, pressure, and timing of the machine to achieve a perfect joint. This ensures that there is no risk of uneven joints or damage to the conveyor belt. The material used in making these machines is of high quality, making them long-lasting and resistant to wear and tear. They also come in various models and sizes to cater to the different needs of customers.
The conveyor belt hot joint machine is another device product released by Wuxi Fuda Vulcanizer Manufacturing Co., Ltd. This machine is designed from high-quality materials and advanced technology to provide a fast and reliable method for hot jointing conveyor belts. It is widely used in industries such as mining, power plants, and cement plants. The hot joint machine comes with features like adjustable temperature control and automatic timing, making it easy to use and ensuring a strong and durable joint. Users have praised the efficiency and speed of this machine, saving them time and labor costs.
This conveyor belt joint machine is not only efficient and cost-effective but also environmentally friendly. It uses a high-quality heating plate and advanced insulation materials, reducing energy consumption and emissions. This makes it an ideal choice for companies looking to reduce their carbon footprint and contribute to a greener environment. It is also designed to be compact and easy to transport, making it suitable for on-site use and reducing transportation costs.
About Wuxi Fuda Vulcanizer Manufacturing Co., Ltd
Wuxi Fuda Vulcanizer Manufacturing Co., Ltd. is a leading manufacturer of conveyor belt joint and repair vulcanizing machines, with over 30 years of experience in the industry. Their products are trusted and used by customers worldwide and have gained a reputation for their high-quality performance, durability, and efficiency. The company is committed to providing the best possible solutions for their customers and continuously strives to improve and innovate their products.

author: Basit Jamiu
title: OMG! Watch the sweet video of a Nigerian lady who packed her bags and relocated abroad
text: “I'm Saving This Sound”: Nigerian Lady Packs Her Bags, Relocates Abroad, Shares Her Excitement - A Nigerian lady’s journey from her homeland to an overseas destination has captured the interest of the online community after she shared a video expressing her delight - The clip showed her preparations for the move, capturing moments of her at the airport, poised for the life-changing relocation - Upon arrival, her excitement is palpable as she embraces the new environment, sharing her initial experiences of the foreign country with an infectious enthusiasm A Nigerian lady who had moved overseas captured the internet’s attention as she shared her exhilaration. Clip depicted her making preparations for the move, including a journey to the airport. Upon reaching her new country, [she radiated joy](https://www.tiktok.com/@sophie_diamond1/), immersing herself in the first impressions of the unfamiliar land,as shown by [@sophie_diamond1](https://www.tiktok.com/@sophie_diamond1/). Watch the video below: PAY ATTENTION: Share your outstanding story with our editors! Please reach us through info@corp.legit.ng! Legit.ng compiled some of the reactions below: BoredGirl said: “I'm saving this sound, so I can use it before this year runs out in Jesus name.” Dolly wrote: “I remember the day lI was leaving home my mom cry so much and die after1 year.” Unshakable commented: “Is like everyone dey japa ooo.” Akinola Abiola also commented: “Congratulations 5s, l've been coming across japa videos since is dis a sign lord.” Tunchi Dior also commented: “Which country did u travel to please.” Roli: “The fact she didn't use filter is the best part.” Lam_äwëlëg: “Congratulations. I won't stop congratulating others till l use this sound.” AshaBiade: “Please anyone that can take me travel abeg I want work oo.” Mustunde: “You go press tire.” Vanessa: “I will be next amen.” Lady speaks two months after relocating Meanwhile, Legit.ng earlier reported that a few months ago, a brave Nigerian lady [decided to leave ](https://www.legit.ng/people/1571937-stop-discouraging-people-uk-sweet-nigerian-lady-relocates-months-speaks/)her home country and embark on a journey to the UK, where she hoped to find better opportunities and a new life. She had always dreamt of living in the UK, but she faced many challenges and doubts from others who did not share her vision. She shared her honest experience of living in the UK and how she overcame the obstacles and fears that others had projected on her decision. PAY ATTENTION: [Unlock the best of Legit.ng on Pinterest!
